data.actual_result: A random selection of emojis appear here. Emojis that you likely did not use and all of them are from the default emoji set (none are server or nitro based)
data.expected_result: The same emojis you selected and/or observed in Step 3 should be here
data.short_description: Frequently Used Emojis are forgotten across version upgrade (633 > 634)
data.steps_to_repro: - Be using Discord 6.3.3 (or lower?) - Use some emojis by using the emoji popout keyboard(😃) in any channel you can to ensure you have some frequently used emojis there - Observe which emojis are listed as frequently used. - Update your Discord Android Client normally to version 6.3.4 via play store [YOU MUST BE OPTED INTO ANDROID ALPHA, SEE FAQ ON HOW TO DO SO] - Launch Discord 6.3.4 and open the emoji popout keyboard (😃)
